column5: Looking to get a chip for my HDS unit for this spring/summer.  I do most of my fishing on the kawarthas/simcoe.   G bay, nipissing, rigging on lake O and possibly erie.   If anyone can recommend a chip that might suit my needs it will be greatly appreciated...  I have no experience with any of these chips
call Jos at Angling Outtfitters, he will fix up with a new or used one.best deal in town
Radioworld would be able to help you. You can email them your questions as well.
PM Roy. He has a good knowledge of these cards and helped me chose mine.  Paul

Buckster, I was in the same situation as you when I bought my HDS5 and because I am North of the great lakes I had to purchase the HotMaps "C" which is all of Canada. I chose the Platinum Lake Maps because it had a few neat features that I'll never use. It covers 1700 lakes including 1000 high def lakes (not Nipissing though).  I think is was about $180.
